name: Beauty Empire
description:
Beauty Empire is a leisure game with exquisite style. Enter the town with Catherine and her friends, turn it into a unique empire from the ground up!

After graduation, Catherine returned to her hometown, only to find it had become a shabby town strewn with waste, rubbish, and tumbleweeds. Could all this trash be turned into treasure? Could the dilapidated town be reborn into a fashionable commercial center? Catherine decides it's time to put her urban planning skills to the ultimate test!
Just simply swipe across the screen to merge the items! Recycle old goods, unlock hundreds of new buildings, design a unique town, meet like-minded friends, new and old... All of your urban planning dreams can come true in Beauty Empire!

GAME FEATURES:
Easy to Start - Just swipe the screen to merge any objects! Use them to build the most fashionable town on a super-large map!
Innovative & Environmental - In the shabby town, everything can be recycled and reused! Come and build an environmentally-friendly town in the new era!
Novel & Massive - From roadside stalls to department stores, from seed to orchard, discover over 320 exciting objects and even more surprises in the merging possibilities!
Managing & Building - After unlocking different stores, earn rich rewards by collecting materials and fulfilling orders. Run your own business, make it an empire!
Events & Friends - Have fun and chase your dreams in exciting random events, amassing a huge set of tasks to accomplish with Catherine!
Exquisite & Casual - With a delicate painting style and melodious music, Beauty Empire is the perfect activity to make you feel at ease.
